channel.title: Problems with No-ip
channel.description: I tried making No-ip "ip" for my server, but people cannot connect with it without joining Hamachi. What do i need to do? Some say something about portforwarding. Is it nesseccary? How do i do it? Can someone tell please.

item.title: Problems with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Zarfay, post:7, topic:226526”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=297672.msg2391957#msg2391957 date=1218997713]
zarfay haven’t we met on the forums like 800 times…and yes port forwarding is the answer to all you…mental problems =D
[/quote]

Lol indeed. Im starting to think your stalking me ;)[/quote]
I was beginning to think the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Hey*, post:1, topic:226526”]I tried making No-ip “ip” for my server, but people cannot connect with it without joining Hamachi.
What do i need to do?
Some say something about portforwarding.
Is it nesseccary?
How do i do it? Can someone tell please.[/quote]

Try portforwarding then see if it works. If you dont know how to portforward, go to the topic on how to make a server.

Read full topic
